resources.string: Select the recipe you want to share. Enter a download code. Your friend downloading the recipe will have to enter the same download code to receive it!
Your friend sharing the recipe will have to upload it before you try to download it. Enter the same download code as the one your friend entered.
You have need to specify a download code.
Cannot find recipe in database. Make sure the other user sends it first. Double check you entered the correct download code.
